languages.text: "Когда я нашел ее... восстановить привычную работу путей снабжения было уже почти невозможно... тогда... на меня вышел... некий доброжелатель. Он не назвался и я никогда не видел его лица. Доброжелатель подсказал, что сможет решить проблему. Все, что потребуется от меня — сделать вид, что ошибку подстроили Версерианы. Остальными доказательствами он обещал заняться сам. И... и..." {n}Корнелиус задыхается от ужаса, не в силах более говорить.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Когда я понял это, восстановить привычную работу путей снабжения было уже почти невозможно... Тогда на меня вышел... некий доброжелатель. Он не назвался и я никогда не видел его лица. Доброжелатель подсказал, что сможет решить проблему, все, что потребуется от меня — сделать вид, что ошибку подстроили Версерианы. Остальными доказательствами он обещал заняться сам. И сдержал обещание..." {n}Закончив говорить, Корнелиус все так же смотрит вниз.{/n}
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: "When I discovered my mistake... it was almost impossible to restore the supply lines... then... I was approached... by someone who said they were... a friend. They did not give me their name and I never saw their face. They promised to fix the problem. All I had to do was pretend that the Werserians were responsible for the mistake. And as for the rest of the evidence, they promised to arrange it all. And... and..." {n}Cornelius is suffocating with fear, unable to speak.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Когда я нашел ее... восстановить привычную работу путей снабжения было уже почти невозможно... тогда... на меня вышел... некий доброжелатель. Он не назвался и я никогда не видел его лица. Доброжелатель подсказал, что сможет решить проблему. Все, что потребуется от меня — сделать вид, что ошибку подстроили Версерианы. Остальными доказательствами он обещал заняться сам. И... и..." {n}Корнелиус задыхается от ужаса, не в силах более говорить.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "When I found it... it was almost impossible to restore the supply lines... then... the well-wisher... had come to me. They did not give me their name and I had never seen their face. The well-wisher had promised to fix the problem. All I had to do was to pretend that the Werserians were responsible for the mistake. And the rest of the evidence he had promised to prepare themselves. And... and..." {n}Cornelius is suffocating with fear, unable to speak.{/n}
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

And as for the rest of the evidence, they promised to arrange it all. And... and..." {n}Cornelius is suffocating with fear, unable to speak.{/n}

languages.text: 「誤ちに気付いた時には…供給ラインを復旧することもほとんど叶わぬ状態で…それで…仲間だと言う人物が…私に話を持ちかけたんです。名前も告げませんでしたし、顔を見たこともありません。彼らがこの問題を解決すると約束してくれました。私は、ミスの責任はウェルザリアン家にあるふりをするだけでよかった。他の証拠はというと、支援者が用意してくれました。それで…それで…」{n}コーネリアスは恐怖で息を詰まらせ、話せなくなっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "When I discovered my mistake... it was almost impossible to restore the supply lines... then... I was approached... by someone who said they were... a friend. They did not give me their name and I never saw their face. They promised to fix the problem. All I had to do was pretend that the Werserians were responsible for the mistake. And as for the rest of the evidence, they promised to arrange it all. And... and..." {n}Cornelius is suffocating with fear, unable to speak.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「誤ちに気付いた時には…供給ラインを復旧することもほとんど叶わぬ状態で…それで…仲間だと言う人物が…私に話を持ちかけたんです。名前も告げませんでしたし、顔を見たこともありません。彼らがこの問題を解決すると約束してくれました。私は、ミスの責任はウェルザリアン家にあるふりをするだけでよかった。他の証拠はというと、支援者が用意してくれました。それで…それで…」{n}コーネリアスは恐怖で息を詰まらせ、話せなくなっている。{/n}
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: “等我发现我犯下的错误时……供应路线几乎已经无法恢复了……然后……然后有个人来到了我身边……他说他是我的……朋友。我不知道他是谁，也没见过他的样子。他答应我，说要帮我解决问题，而我要做的，就是把所有错误都推到韦尔森家族头上。至于其他证据，那个人说他会自己准备好的。我……我……”{n}科尼利厄斯似乎被恐惧扼住了喉咙，再也说不出话来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "When I discovered my mistake... it was almost impossible to restore the supply lines... then... I was approached... by someone who said they were... a friend. They did not give me their name and I never saw their face. They promised to fix the problem. All I had to do was pretend that the Werserians were responsible for the mistake. And as for the rest of the evidence, they promised to arrange it all. And... and..." {n}Cornelius is suffocating with fear, unable to speak.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “等我发现我犯下的错误时……供应路线几乎已经无法恢复了……然后……然后有个人来到了我身边……他说他是我的……朋友。我不知道他是谁，也没见过他的样子。他答应我，说要帮我解决问题，而我要做的，就是把所有错误都推到韦尔森家族头上。至于其他证据，那个人说他会自己准备好的。我……我……”{n}科尼利厄斯似乎被恐惧扼住了喉咙，再也说不出话来。{/n}
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: « Quand je me suis aperçu de mon erreur... il était déjà trop tard pour rétablir les lignes de ravitaillement... C'est là que... j'ai été approché par... quelqu'un qui s'est présenté comme... un ami. Cet individu ne m'a jamais donné son nom, et je n'ai jamais vu son visage. Je serais d'ailleurs bien incapable de dire s'il s'agissait d'un homme ou d'une femme. Quoi qu'il en soit, il m'a promis de résoudre le problème. Tout ce que je devais faire, c'était prétendre que les Werserian étaient à l'origine de mon erreur. Pour ce qui était des autres preuves, il m'a dit qu'il s'en chargerait lui-même. Et... et... » {n}La peur étouffe Cornelius, l'empêchant de poursuivre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When I discovered my mistake... it was almost impossible to restore the supply lines... then... I was approached... by someone who said they were... a friend. They did not give me their name and I never saw their face. They promised to fix the problem. All I had to do was pretend that the Werserians were responsible for the mistake. And as for the rest of the evidence, they promised to arrange it all. And... and..." {n}Cornelius is suffocating with fear, unable to speak.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Quand je me suis aperçu de mon erreur... il était déjà trop tard pour rétablir les lignes de ravitaillement... C'est là que... j'ai été approché par... quelqu'un qui s'est présenté comme... un ami. Cet individu ne m'a jamais donné son nom, et je n'ai jamais vu son visage. Je serais d'ailleurs bien incapable de dire s'il s'agissait d'un homme ou d'une femme. Quoi qu'il en soit, il m'a promis de résoudre le problème. Tout ce que je devais faire, c'était prétendre que les Werserian étaient à l'origine de mon erreur. Pour ce qui était des autres preuves, il m'a dit qu'il s'en chargerait lui-même. Et... et... » {n}La peur étouffe Cornelius, l'empêchant de poursuivre.{/n}
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: «Cuando descubrí mi error... era casi imposible restaurar las líneas de suministro... Entonces... acudió a mí un alma bondadosa que afirmaba ser... un amigo. Nunca vi su cara ni me dijo su nombre. Me prometió arreglar el problema. Lo único que tenía que hacer era fingir que los Werserian eran los culpables del error. Prometió encargarse del resto de pruebas. Y... y...». {n}Cornelius, asfixiado por el miedo, es incapaz de seguir hablando.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When I discovered my mistake... it was almost impossible to restore the supply lines... then... I was approached... by someone who said they were... a friend. They did not give me their name and I never saw their face. They promised to fix the problem. All I had to do was pretend that the Werserians were responsible for the mistake. And as for the rest of the evidence, they promised to arrange it all. And... and..." {n}Cornelius is suffocating with fear, unable to speak.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Cuando descubrí mi error... era casi imposible restaurar las líneas de suministro... Entonces... acudió a mí un alma bondadosa que afirmaba ser... un amigo. Nunca vi su cara ni me dijo su nombre. Me prometió arreglar el problema. Lo único que tenía que hacer era fingir que los Werserian eran los culpables del error. Prometió encargarse del resto de pruebas. Y... y...». {n}Cornelius, asfixiado por el miedo, es incapaz de seguir hablando.{/n}
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: "Als ich meinen Fehler erkannte ... war es schon fast unmöglich, die Versorgungslinien wiederherzustellen ... dann ... Trat jemand an mich heran ... jemand, der sagte, er wäre ... ein Freund. Er hat seinen Namen nicht genannt und ich habe sein Gesicht nie gesehen. Er versprach mir, das Problem zu beheben. Ich musste lediglich so tun, als wären die Werserians für den Fehler verantwortlich. Die übrigen Beweise wollte er selbst beschaffen. Und ... und ..." {n}Cornelius ist derart verängstigt, dass er nicht weitersprechen kann.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When I discovered my mistake... it was almost impossible to restore the supply lines... then... I was approached... by someone who said they were... a friend. They did not give me their name and I never saw their face. They promised to fix the problem. All I had to do was pretend that the Werserians were responsible for the mistake. And as for the rest of the evidence, they promised to arrange it all. And... and..." {n}Cornelius is suffocating with fear, unable to speak.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Als ich den Fehler entdeckt habe ... war es schon fast unmöglich, die Versorgungslinien zu korrigieren ... und dann ... hat mich der anonyme Helfer kontaktiert. Er hat seinen Namen nicht genannt und ich habe sein Gesicht nie gesehen. Der Helfer hat versprochen, das Problem zu beheben. Ich musste lediglich so tun, als seien die Werserians für den Fehler verantwortlich. Die übrigen Beweise wollte der Helfer selbst vorbereiten. Und ... und ..." {n}Cornelius ist so verängstigt, dass er nicht weitersprechen kann.{/n}
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: "Hatamı fark ettiğimde... İkmal hatlarını düzeltmek neredeyse imkânsızdı... Sonra... Birisi geldi... Benim tarafımda olduğunu söyledi. Ne ismini öğrenebildim ne de yüzünü görebildim. Bu şahıs, sorunu çözüme kavuşturacağına söz verdi. Dediğine göre tek yapmam gereken, hatanın sorumlusu Werserian Hanesi'ymiş gibi davranmakmış. Diğer delillerin de icabına bakacağını söyledi. Bir... Bir de..." {n}Cornelius, âdeta korkudan boğulup konuşamıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When I discovered my mistake... it was almost impossible to restore the supply lines... then... I was approached... by someone who said they were... a friend. They did not give me their name and I never saw their face. They promised to fix the problem. All I had to do was pretend that the Werserians were responsible for the mistake. And as for the rest of the evidence, they promised to arrange it all. And... and..." {n}Cornelius is suffocating with fear, unable to speak.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hatamı fark ettiğimde... ikmal hatlarını düzeltmek neredeyse imkânsızdı... Sonra... birisi gelip... benim tarafımda... olduğunu söyledi. Ne ismini öğrenebildim ne de yüzünü görebildim. Bu şahıs, sorunu çözüme kavuşturacağına söz verdi. Dediğine göre tek yapmam gereken, hatanın sorumlusu Werserian Hanesiymiş gibi davranmaktı. Diğer delillerin de icabına bakacağını söyledi. Ve... Ve..." {n}Cornelius âdeta korkudan boğuluyor, konuşamıyor bile.{/n}
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam
